title: GetSubordinate (Method)
text:
METHOD GetSubordinate : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Gets a subordinate (given by a BACnet-Object-Reference) and a subordinate anotation at index nIndex from the Subordinate_List-Property and
the Subordinate_Annotations-Property of this BACnet-Object. Both the subordinate and its annotation are aquired simulatenously by
this function.

rows.Name: nIndex
rows.Comment: The 1 based index of the subordnate to get.

rows.Name: subordinate
rows.Comment: The gotten subordnate reference after the method call.

rows:
The annotation of the gotten subordinate after the method
call.
